info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 19 at 8:27AM MST until November 19 at 11:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Yavapai County in west central Arizona...
* Until 1130 AM MST.
* At 827 AM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the Fossil Creek Watershed. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, normally dry washes, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
This includes the following highways... State Route 260 near mile marker 248. State Route 87 between mile markers 273 and 276...and near mile marker 278.
This includes the following swimming holes... All swimming holes and waterfalls on Fossil Creek and Fossil Creek Dam "The Toilet Bowl".
This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Verde River, Hardscrabble Creek, Houston Creek, Fossil Creek and West Clear Creek.
info.instruction: Flooding of washes and creeks will occur, some dirt roads will become muddy and impassable. Paved roads and underpasses could become flooded as well.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 11:30 AM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 11:30 AM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

area.areaDesc: Coconino, AZ; Gila, AZ; Yavapai, AZ

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 11:30 AM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 11:30 AM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.

area.areaDesc: Coconino, AZ; Gila, AZ; Yavapai, AZ
